summary: Add a separate Cloud Operations API client for the TypeScript SDK using cloud protos, marked as experimental. This aligns with similar implementations in other SDKs like Go.
userImpact: Users will have a dedicated cloud operations client available in TypeScript SDK for managing Temporal Cloud workflows and operations.
proposedFix: Create a separate cloud client using cloud protos, following the pattern established in the Go SDK (PR #1426).
resolutionDetails: Cloud operations API client was implemented in the TypeScript SDK following the Go SDK pattern.
keyQuote: We need a separate cloud client using the cloud protos (they are separate today). The client should be marked experimental.
